answers.answer: I would be taking your wife to an ER as with a TSH of 320 is dangerous.Myexedema Coma is one thing that can happen.Your wife should be on a T4 med and checked that she doesnt have a Pit. Gland Tumour.The high TSH would make the LDL go up .Your wid=fe really needs to go to a hospital to get that TSH down FAST.

Hi are you sure it was Thyroup and not Thyrox your wife was given? Thyroup is given to animals!Serbex Gold is used to treat people with cardiovascular disease and also diabetes, does your wife have these issues?Here is a link to having high LDL and what can happen  http://www.mbonfa.com/cholesterol/ldl.htm  (Cut and paste it into your browsers web address bar)Are you sure the TSH is perhaps 3.20? It is easy to misread the reports and forget to put the dot between the numbers. Some people have extremely high numbers, I have seen over 500 for a TSH and they didn't even know it! It would be best to double check with a 2nd doctor.

question: Hi !! My wife( Age 33yrs )  has a TSH level of 320 and LDL of 172 .She was perfectly normal 1.5 yrs back .I have the following questions. Kindly reply1) Is she susceptible to Heart Attack?2) The doctor has prescribed her Thyroup 25mcg, surbex gold and de cal. are the medicines correct ?3) Does High TSH levels lead to high LDL ?4) is there any restriction on food for her ?5) The doctor has not prescribed any medicines for her LDL . does she need medicines for treating LDL ?
title: Thyoid levels and food habits
